extendedInfo.description: It does not matter if you want to kill some time, if you feel lonely or it is just 3 am in the morning and nobody is around you. Your Chat partner Elmit is here for you. Just talk and Elmit will answer, ... any time!Talk about any think you like, your school, your parents, your kids, your wife, .. Elmit is listening and answers to any subjects you like, regardless if it is your friend Janet, Peter or your math or science teacher or if it is a problem you push ahead of you.Elmit is a robot. It gets never tired to answer, and it has limited knowledge, but with all your talks Elmit gets smarter. It remembers what you were talking.

reviews.comment: This thing sucks it keeps on zooming in and out and i try to fix it but it just won\'t work do not install this it sucks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very funny
reviews.comment: Good to kill time at waiting places, like, bus,dentist or government office.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Elmit is very amusing. She is one of my best friends. Please explain to her what <3 means. (Heart)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Answers questions with download me constantly
reviews.author: A Google User
